original: intros f g x Hloc Hf. apply continuity_pt_locally_ext with (a := 1). - apply Rlt_0_1. - intros y Hy. destruct Hloc as [eps Heps]. specialize (Heps y). unfold ball in Heps. apply Heps. unfold R_dist. lra. - apply Hf.
